summary: A teen is visited by aliens after he broadcasts a message into space.
cast: Michael Shulman|Erika Christensen|Adam Wylie|Andrew Ducote|Lee Garlington|Brighton Hertford|Marcus Turner|Malcolm McDowell|Chris Davies|Marie Stillin|Jessica Murdoch|Terry David Mulligan|Brian Steele|Hrothgar Mathews|J.D. Hall|Peter Kelamis|Guy Fauchon|Bruce Lanoil|Wally Wingert|David Coburn|Tara Strong|Garrett M. Brown|Paul Hooson
title: La puerta de las galaxias
